TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit AssociationProvider extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Provides the base class for column-association providers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Association providers must extend this class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class for use by an inherited class instance. This constructor can only be called by an inherited class.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Web.DynamicData.ModelProviders.AssociationDirection Direction { get; protected set; }

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the type of the association.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Associations include one-to-one, one-to-many, and many-to-many.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection<string> ForeignKeyNames { get; protected set; }

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the names of the foreign keys that make up this association.
Docs.value: The names of the foreign keys that make up this association.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Web.DynamicData.ModelProviders.ColumnProvider FromColumn { get; protected set; }

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the source column of the association.
Docs.value: The source column of the association.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string GetSortExpression(class System.Web.DynamicData.ModelProviders.ColumnProvider sortColumn) cil managed

Docs.param: The column to sort the entity by.
Docs.summary: Returns the sort expression for the column that is represented by the association.
Docs.returns: If <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.ModelProviders.ColumnProvider.IsSortable%2A> returns , the sort expression for the column that is represented by the association; otherwise, .

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual bool IsPrimaryKeyInThisTable { get; protected set; }

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the From column part of the primary key is in the table.
Docs.value: if the From column part of the primary key is in the table; otherwise, .

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Web.DynamicData.ModelProviders.ColumnProvider ToColumn { get; protected set; }

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the destination column of the association.
Docs.value: The destination column of the association.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This property is optional and is generally required only for one-to-many and one-to-one relationships

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Web.DynamicData.ModelProviders.TableProvider ToTable { get; protected set; }

Docs.summary: Gets the destination table of the association.
